com.adobe.cq.social.messaging.client.api

Interface MessageSocialComponent<T extends CommentCollectionConfiguration>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comment<T>, SocialCollectionComponent, SocialComponent

    public interface MessageSocialComponent<T extends CommentCollectionConfiguration>
extends Comment<T>
    Represents a single Social Messaging message.

        java.util.List<Attachment> getAttachmentsList()
        Retrieves a list, an entry of which represents Attachment. The list contains all the attachments of the message.
        Returns:
        A List representing the available attachments, or an empty list if no attachments are present.

      • setDeleted

        boolean setDeleted(boolean value)
        mark the message as trashed or un-trashed.
        Parameters:
        value - true if the message is to be trashed, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true if existing value on message was different from passed value, false otherwise.
